resources.string: Sudoku Word allows you to import CSV files with your own vocabulary to practice. You can download the CSV files from a website. These files should be stored in your "Downloads" folder, and accessible through the app. Another possibility is to connect the device via USB to a computer, and upload the files to the Downloads directory, if your CSV files are stored on your computer, and not on your Android device. You may be required to press the vertical column with 3 dots on top right of screen to show additional storage options. This step is dependent on the Android version. For Android Oreo, you have to allow to show "internal storage", to access all features. This step is necessary on an emulator. For an emulator, since it is not a real phone, the easiest way is to manually put the CSV files in the phone\'s Downloads folder, using Android Studio. All other options work as well, but may be harder on an emulator. Additionally, the name of the Word Package should not exceed 35 characters. The format of a CSV file must not contain any
